All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DatabaseDetailService
Class that represents the implementation of the Detail Service that uses a database as the datasource.
DatabasePurchaseService
Class that represents the implementation of the Purchase Service that uses a database as the datasource.
Detail
Class that represents the structure of a purchase detail.
DetailAlreadyExistingException
Exception class that represents the structure of an already existing detail exception.
DetailController
Class that represents the structure of a REST Controller for the Detail domain.
DetailCreateRequest
Class that represents the structure of a detail creation request.
DetailException
Abstract class that represents the structure of a detail generic exception.
DetailNotFoundException
Exception class that represents the structure of a not found detail exception.
DetailRepository
Interface that represents the structure of a JPA Repository of details.
DetailRequest
Abstract class that represents the structure of a detail generic request.
DetailResponse
Class that represents the structure of a detail generic response.
DetailService
Interface that represents the managed behaviours of a detail.
DetailUpdateRequest
Class that represents the structure of a detail update request.
Error
Class that represents the structure of an Error used to handle the exceptions thrown in the application runtime.
Error.Field
Inner class that represents the structure of a Field.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Class that represents the structure of a Global Exception Handler built using a Controller Advice.
MissingDetailException
Exception class that represents the structure of a missing detail exception.
